name: Generative AI for Visualization
description: Generative AI (Gen AI) cuts across different fields and Data Analysis is no exception. It helps make analysis faster, easier, and more efficient. Like with everything, Gen AI is a double-edged sword with advantages and disadvantages. In this course, you’ll learn about the different applications of Gen AI in data analysis, data preparation, data visualization, querying databases, code generation, prompt engineering, LLM APIs/Libraries, ethics, and case studies.
